Download.Document.Failure:
Due to technical reasons it is currently not possible to generate a CV in PDF+Europass XML or Word format.

Please save your CV in XML format and try later to upload the file (using the link 'Update your Europass CV (Europass XML or AdobeÂ® PDF+Europass XML)' and select the appropriate format.
